articles.title: Woman caught hilariously knitting during Frances Tiafoe-Carlos Alcaraz US Open thriller - New York Post
articles.description: Frances Tiafoe and Carlos Alcaraz played a thriller Friday night at the U.S. Open but it apparently wasn’t entertaining enough for one fan.
